trans-unit.source: Models an If-Then-Else condition.
trans-unit.target: 建立 If-Then-Else 條件的模型。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates creating an <xref:System.Activities.Statements.If> activity.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.If> 活動。

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Sending and Handling Faults](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/sending-and-handling-faults.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例取自[傳送和處理錯誤](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/sending-and-handling-faults.md)範例。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.If" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.If" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The execution condition.
trans-unit.target: 執行條件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.If" /> class using the specified condition.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的條件建立 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.If" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.target: 執行條件。

trans-unit.target: 使用指定的條件建立 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.If" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates creating an <xref:System.Activities.Statements.If> activity.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.If> 活動。

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Sending and Handling Faults](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/sending-and-handling-faults.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例取自[傳送和處理錯誤](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/sending-and-handling-faults.md)範例。

trans-unit.source: The condition that determines which child activity to execute.
trans-unit.target: 判斷要執行哪個子活動的條件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.If.Then" /> activity executes if the condition resolves to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果條件解析為 <see langword="true" />，則 <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.If.Then" /> 活動會執行。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.If.Else" /> activity executes if the condition resolves to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果條件解析為 <see langword="false" />，則 <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.If.Else" /> 活動會執行。

trans-unit.source: The execution condition.
trans-unit.target: 執行條件。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates setting the Condition property of an <xref:System.Activities.Statements.If> activity.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.If> 活動的 Condition 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Sending and Handling Faults](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/sending-and-handling-faults.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例取自[傳送和處理錯誤](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/sending-and-handling-faults.md)範例。

trans-unit.source: The activity to be executed if the activity’s <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.If.Condition" /> resolves to **false**.
trans-unit.target: 當活動的 <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.If.Condition" /> 解析為 **false** 時執行的活動。

trans-unit.source: The child activity.
trans-unit.target: 子活動。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates setting the Else property of an <xref:System.Activities.Statements.If> activity.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.If> 活動的 Else 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Sending and Handling Faults](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/sending-and-handling-faults.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例取自[傳送和處理錯誤](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/sending-and-handling-faults.md)範例。

trans-unit.source: The activity to be executed if the activity’s <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.If.Condition" /> resolves to **true**.
trans-unit.target: 當活動的 <see cref="P:System.Activities.Statements.If.Condition" /> 解析為 **true** 時執行的活動。

trans-unit.source: The child activity.
trans-unit.target: 子活動。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.If> 活動的 Then 屬性。

trans-unit.target: 這個範例取自[傳送和處理錯誤](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/sending-and-handling-faults.md)範例。
